summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 HONDA CR-V. THE CONTACT STATED THE FRONT DRIVER SIDE SEAT HAD STARTED TO DETERIORATE FROM THE LEFT CUSHION. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO CHECKERED FLAG HONDA DEALER, WHERE IT WAS INFORMED THAT HONDA WAS AWARE OF THE FAILURE BUT DOES NOT HAVE A REMEDY. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 6,300. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. ...UPDATED 08/31/17 *BF    *CN
